description:
The program has GNOME wallpapers. It shows up on KDE because it's all the same storefront. This is Flathub -- it shows the same programs for all distros and DEs that use it. It's up to you to use common sense and install apps that make sense for your usage. Don't complain that apps obviously made for GNOME don't work on KDE.

That aside, this app is great. It's neat to go back and see the old GNOME wallpapers! Also, if you want to display these wallpapers on KDE, it is possible. KDE can display wallpapers just fine, so that other user has literally no idea what they're talking about.
summary: Of course it doesn't work on KDE

description: Based on the description, I'd had the impression this would be for setting historical wallpapers. As a list of wallpapers, however, it works fine. I would rather have this as a simple site, however.
I really want to give this app a good rating, but it doesn't work :/
No more digging through GitLab! Sometimes it takes a while to apply - maybe needs a progress indicator

summary: Wallpapers worth looking at every day

description:
The app doesn't work, every time I try to set a wallpaper it just turns my screen black as if there was no wallpaper at all :(
It worked once. Idk if something changed with the release of GNOME40, I'm using this on GNOME3.38.
I'd love to see version that works with "time driven" wallpapers for Gnome (switching day/night flavor of the wallpaper during the day). Other than that - no complains, great simple app!

App focues on GNOME so why is it being shown in KDE's store? Does not work in KDE. You can not set any wallpaper. Also, I constantly had problems trying to get the window to scroll downward. Recommend something is noted about it not working in KDE.

It has all the classic GNOME stripes and triangles you could wish for in one place, love it. Sometimes the timed wallpapers can glitch. It can help to change the wallpaper and then change back again. It should load properly then.
Es muy fácil de recordar las versiones de GNOME. Y funciona como si fuera un anillo al dedo.

Прекрасное приложение, благодаря которому можно взять и поставить обои из старых версий Gnome, которые к большому сожалению не доступны. А ведь среди них были и прекрасные экземпляры. Но в любом случае, тем, кто без ума от старых обоев Gnome Foundation, это приложение должно прийтись по душе.
